org.spongepowered.api.potion

Interface PotionEffectBuilder


  • public interface PotionEffectBuilder
    Represents a builder interface to create a PotionEffect.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PotionEffectBuilder ambience(boolean ambience)
      Sets the potion effect to be ambient or not.
      PotionEffectBuilder amplifier(int amplifier)
      Sets the amplifier power of the potion effect.
      PotionEffect build()
      Builds an instance of a PotionEffect.
      PotionEffectBuilder duration(int duration)
      Sets the duration of the potion effect.
      PotionEffectBuilder particles(boolean showsParticles)
      Sets the potion effect to show particles when applied or not.
      PotionEffectBuilder potionType(PotionEffectType potionEffectType)
      Sets the PotionEffectType of the potion.
      PotionEffectBuilder reset()
      Resets all information regarding the item stack to be created.

      • amplifier

        PotionEffectBuilder amplifier(int amplifier)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the amplifier power of the potion effect.

        Amplifiers must be above zero.

        Parameters:
        amplifier - The amplifier power
        Returns:
        This builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the amplifier is less than zero

      • ambience

        PotionEffectBuilder ambience(boolean ambience)
        Sets the potion effect to be ambient or not.
        Parameters:
        ambience - Whether the potion effect is ambient
        Returns:
        This builder

      • particles

        PotionEffectBuilder particles(boolean showsParticles)
        Sets the potion effect to show particles when applied or not.
        Parameters:
        showsParticles - Whether the potion effect will show particles
        Returns:
        This builder

      • reset

        PotionEffectBuilder reset()
        Resets all information regarding the item stack to be created.
        Returns:
        This builder

      • build

        PotionEffect build()
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Builds an instance of a PotionEffect.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a PotionEffect
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the potion effect is not completed
